law.text: The provisions of KRS 12.028 and 194A.040(1) shall not apply to KRS 216.537 to 216.590.
law.history: Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 432, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 331, sec. 35, effective July 15, 1986. -- Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 157, sec. 25, effective July 15, 1982.
